heading: VEHICLE AND MAINTENANCE ALERTS
name: preferences_vehicle_alerts
shortDescription:
Lexus Enform Service Connect[D-SERVCONNECT] provides important alerts to you and allows your dealer to contact you when maintenance is needed. This will keep your Lexus running at its best.

Be notified wherever you are. Get immediate alerts if you're running low on oil, or if there is a malfunction with one of the systems in your Lexus.
